title: US Power Shortage: How Small Modular Nuclear Reactors Could Fill the Gap
description: US electricity demand is now expected to rise 20 to 100 percent over the next 15 years as AI data centers, chip fabs and electrification strain an aging grid. Scott Strazik and Nicole Holmes of GE Vernova and Joseph Majkut of CSIS explain why nuclear – especially through small modular reactors – is back on the table. (Source: Bloomberg)
